plugins.name: Background Manager
plugins.description:
Background Manager makes it easy to switch your Figma canvas background between light, dark, or any custom color — instantly.


Use presets, apply hex values, or pick your own color with a live preview. Includes an optional "close after apply" toggle and resizable window for a smooth, focused workflow.


Built for designers who care about context, mood, and file readability.


  1. Light, Dark, and Custom background modes
  2. Color picker + hex input
  3. Auto-syncs to your current canvas background
  4. "Close after applying" option
  5. Minimal, Figma-native UI
plugins.tagline: Quickly switch or customize your canvas background without breaking flow.

130561.tagline: Quickly switch or customize your canvas background without breaking flow.

plugins.name: SnapCap
plugins.description:
Capture screenshots from any webpage and instantly send them to your FigJam board or Figma Design file in a single click, making it easier than ever to document user experiences as you browse the web.


Please note that to use SnapCap, you will also need to install the companion Chrome extension at snapcap.app/extension


How to Use SnapCap

Installation

  1. Install the Figma plugin
  2. Install the Chrome browser extension, and pin it


Session Setup

  1. Open the FigJam board or Figma Design file where you wish to send screenshots
  2. Launch the Figma plugin and click "Start new session"
  3. Copy the generated session code
  4. Click on the SnapCap browser extension and enter the copied session code


Taking Screenshots

Once your session has connected, click on the SnapCap browser extension anytime you want to take a screenshot and send it to your Figma file. A check mark will be shown on the extension icon to indicate that the screenshot was captured successfully, and it will show up moments later in the Figma file where the FigCap plugin is running.


Ending Session

When you are done taking screenshots, click the End button. If the SnapCap browser extension does not automatically disconnect, you can right click on the extension icon and select "End session"


Demo video and more at www.snapcap.app/
plugins.tagline: Capture screenshots from any webpage and instantly send them to your Figma files

When you are done taking screenshots, click the End button. If the SnapCap browser extension does not automatically disconnect, you can right click on the extension icon and select "End session"


Demo video and more at www.snapcap.app/

networkAccess.reasoning: FigCap temporarily stores images captured by the Chrome extension in Supabase.

134331.tagline: Capture screenshots from any webpage and instantly send them to your Figma files

plugins.name: Long side scaling
plugins.description:
Tired of manually resizing images within frames one by one, especially when you need them to fit a specific maximum dimension while keeping their aspect ratio? "Long Side Scaling" automates this task!


What this plugin does:

  1. It finds the first visible Rectangle node with an Image fill inside each selected Frame.
  2. It takes the dimension you provide (e.g., 1040px).
  3. It identifies whether the image's width or height is larger (the "longest side").
  4. It then proportionally resizes the image so that its longest side exactly matches the dimension you entered.


How to use:

  1. Select one or more Frames containing the images you want to resize.
  2. Run the "Long Side Scaling" plugin from the Plugins menu.
  3. The plugin window will show how many selected frames contain a suitable image.
  4. Enter the desired dimension (in pixels) for the longest side into the input field.
  5. Click the "Start" button.
  6. The images within the selected frames will be resized instantly!


Key Benefits:

  1. Batch Processing: Saves time by resizing images in multiple frames at once.
  2. Proportional Scaling: Guarantees your images won't be stretched or distorted.
  3. Consistent Sizing: Perfect for creating uniform image galleries, grids, or ensuring images don't exceed a maximum width or height.
  4. Simple Interface: Easy to use with just one input and one button.


Important Note:

This plugin specifically targets the first visible Rectangle node with an Image fill it finds directly within each selected Frame. Images inside groups within the frame, or images applied as fills to shapes other than Rectangles, will not be affected.
plugins.tagline: Scale images proportionally by their longest side.

plugins.name: FigJam Sticky Color Picker
plugins.description:
This is a plugin for setting the color of Sticky:

  1. Directly set the fill color of the Sticky.
  2. It is also able to set the color of the text within the Sticky.
  3. You can set the color for a single Sticky node, or for multiple selected Sticky nodes. Even more, you can directly select an area, and the plugin will automatically identify the Sticky nodes within the selected area and change their colors as well as the colors of the text.
plugins.tagline: Custom the color of sticky and sticky text

plugins.name: LARA for Figma
plugins.description:
LARA is the flagship product of Lithero, the first AI company to design and build products specifically for pharma marketing teams. LARA is a custom-made AI that learns the nuances of pharma brands at lightspeed, supporting brand teams throughout the end-to-end content creation process.


The official LARA for Figma plugin brings the power of LARA Screen and LARA Claims to your workspace. Get actionable feedback on the compliance of your content at the point of creation, saving significant time downstream. LARA for Figma complements the content creation process by ensuring high quality and accuracy of created content. Shorten review cycles, reduce spend, and get the most out of Figma with LARA!


Key Features:

Claims

- Detect differences between created content and approved claims, enabling corrections before MLR

- Trace claims back to their references and associated safety text in LARA Claims for additional context


Safety Text

- Identify and insert any required safety text missing from the content

- Generate accurate & complete safety text blocks to insert into content


References

- Find potential approved references that could be used to substantiate claims

- Locate any claims that are missing citations to typically seen references


*Requires subscription to LARA Claims and Screen. For more information, visit https://www.lithero.com/
plugins.tagline: Bring the power of LARA to your process

plugins.name: json数据转设计稿 json to Frame
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin allows users to quickly create Figma elements by inputting JSON data, improving workflow efficiency.


Function Description

  1. Generate Figma elements through JSON input
  2. Multi-language user interface support
  3. Compatible with multi-layered frame structures
  4. Can be used together with the plugin Export Frame JSON Pro for seamless frame export and import.


How to Use

  1. Open the plugin interface and select the appropriate language.
  2. Enter or paste valid JSON data into the JSON input field.
  3. Click the “Submit JSON” button, and the plugin will generate corresponding Figma elements based on the input data.


Important Notes

  1. Ensure the JSON data is correctly formatted, or elements may not be generated properly.
  2. This plugin can be used together with Export Frame JSON Pro for quick frame import and export.


介绍

本插件允许用户通过输入 JSON 数据，快速生成 Figma 画板中的元素，提升设计工作效率。


功能说明

  1. 通过 JSON 输入生成 Figma 元素
  2. 支持多种语言的用户界面
  3. 兼容画板的多层次结构
  4. 支持与【画板 JSON 导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro】插件配合使用，轻松实现画板导出与导入的无缝对接。


使用方法

  1. 打开插件界面，选择适合的语言。
  2. 在 JSON 输入框中输入或粘贴有效的 JSON 数据。
  3. 点击“提交 JSON”按钮，插件将根据输入的数据生成对应的 Figma 元素。


注意事项

  1. 确保输入的 JSON 数据格式正确，否则可能无法生成元素。
  2. 该插件支持与【画板 JSON 导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro】插件一起使用，实现画板的快速导入导出。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Easily create Figma frames from JSON data input.

plugins.name: 路径文字 Path Text Aligner
plugins.description:
Introduction

Path Text Aligner is a Figma plugin that allows users to easily align text along any custom path, providing more flexibility and control over text placement in your design.


Function Description

  1. Aligns selected text to any vector path or shape.
  2. Adjusts text along curves, straight lines, and complex paths.
  3. Offers controls for offset and spacing to fine-tune text positioning.
  4. Supports multi-line text alignment along a path.


How to Use

  1. Select the text you want to align.
  2. Draw or select the path you want the text to follow.
  3. Run the plugin, and the text will automatically align to the path.
  4. Adjust settings for text spacing, direction, and offset to achieve the desired effect.


Notes

  1. This plugin works best with vector paths (e.g., lines or shapes).
  2. Ensure the text layer is not grouped with other objects for proper alignment.
  3. You may need to adjust font size or path curvature for optimal results.


介绍

路径文字（Path Text Aligner）是一个Figma插件，允许用户轻松地将文字沿自定义路径对齐，在设计中提供更多的灵活性和控制。


功能说明

  1. 将选中的文字沿任意矢量路径或形状对齐。
  2. 支持文本在曲线、直线及复杂路径上的对齐。
  3. 提供偏移和间距控制，以微调文本的位置。
  4. 支持沿路径对齐多行文本。


使用方法

  1. 选择要对齐的文字。
  2. 绘制或选择要让文字跟随的路径。
  3. 启动插件，文字将自动沿路径对齐。
  4. 调整文本间距、方向和偏移设置，以获得理想效果。


注意事项

  1. 此插件适用于矢量路径（例如，线条或形状）。
  2. 请确保文字图层未与其他对象组合，以确保正确对齐。
  3. 根据路径曲率和字体大小调整设置，以获得最佳效果。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Align text along any path with ease in Figma.

plugins.name: 图表库 Chart Master
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows designers to quickly insert predefined design frames into their projects with just a click. It simplifies the process of applying consistent styles, layouts, and content, enhancing productivity and design consistency.


Features Introduction

•Insert predefined design frames with a single click.

•Automatically apply layout settings and styles to frames.

•Supports multiple language interfaces (English, Chinese, etc.).

•Real-time error notifications and fallbacks for seamless user experience.


How to Use

1.Open the Figma plugin and choose your desired design frame.

2.Click the insert button to add the frame to your design.

3.Customize the frame as needed—styles and layouts are already applied.

4.Switch languages via the plugin settings if required.


Notes

•Ensure all necessary fonts are installed to avoid fallback issues.

•If errors occur, check the console for detailed messages.

•Language settings can be changed anytime through the plugin interface.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件让设计师可以轻松地在项目中插入预定义的设计框架。通过简化应用一致的样式、布局和内容的过程，插件提高了生产力和设计一致性。


功能说明

•一键插入预定义的设计框架。

•自动应用框架的布局设置和样式。

•支持多语言界面（英语、中文等）。

•实时错误通知和回退功能，确保无缝用户体验。


使用方法

1.打开 Figma 插件，选择您需要的设计框架。

2.点击插入按钮，将框架添加到您的设计中。

3.根据需要自定义框架—样式和布局已自动应用。

4.如果需要，通过插件设置切换语言。


注意事项

•确保已安装所有必要的字体，以避免回退问题。

•如果发生错误，请检查控制台获取详细信息。

•可以随时通过插件界面更改语言设置。

accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Effortlessly Insert and Style Design Frames with a Click

101977.name: 图表库 Chart Master
101977.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows designers to quickly insert predefined design frames into their projects with just a click. It simplifies the process of applying consistent styles, layouts, and content, enhancing productivity and design consistency.


Features Introduction

•Insert predefined design frames with a single click.

•Automatically apply layout settings and styles to frames.

•Supports multiple language interfaces (English, Chinese, etc.).

•Real-time error notifications and fallbacks for seamless user experience.


How to Use

1.Open the Figma plugin and choose your desired design frame.

2.Click the insert button to add the frame to your design.

3.Customize the frame as needed—styles and layouts are already applied.

4.Switch languages via the plugin settings if required.


Notes

•Ensure all necessary fonts are installed to avoid fallback issues.

•If errors occur, check the console for detailed messages.

•Language settings can be changed anytime through the plugin interface.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件让设计师可以轻松地在项目中插入预定义的设计框架。通过简化应用一致的样式、布局和内容的过程，插件提高了生产力和设计一致性。


功能说明

•一键插入预定义的设计框架。

•自动应用框架的布局设置和样式。

•支持多语言界面（英语、中文等）。

•实时错误通知和回退功能，确保无缝用户体验。


使用方法

1.打开 Figma 插件，选择您需要的设计框架。

2.点击插入按钮，将框架添加到您的设计中。

3.根据需要自定义框架—样式和布局已自动应用。

4.如果需要，通过插件设置切换语言。


注意事项

•确保已安装所有必要的字体，以避免回退问题。

•如果发生错误，请检查控制台获取详细信息。

•可以随时通过插件界面更改语言设置。
101977.tagline: Effortlessly Insert and Style Design Frames with a Click

plugins.name: 혼용되는 외래어, 한자어 & 금용용어 사전
plugins.description:
혼용되는 외래어와 한자어, 어려운 금융 용어까지 한눈에!

이 서비스는 일상에서 자주 접하지만 정확히 알기 어려운 단어들을 쉽게 풀어주는 언어 가이드입니다.

단어의 출처, 의미, 바른 사용법은 물론, 대체 가능한 순우리말까지 함께 제공하여

더 정확하고 이해하기 쉬운 소통을 도와드립니다.


📘 외래어 vs 한자어 구분

💬 금융 용어 번역과 설명

🔍 혼동되는 표현 비교


언제나 쉽고, 누구나 알 수 있도록.

“이 단어, 정말 맞는 표현일까?” 고민될 땐, 지금 바로 검색하세요.


A guide to mixed foreign, Sino-Korean, and finance terms — all in one place.

This service helps you understand commonly used yet often confusing words with ease.

We offer origins, meanings, proper usage, and even alternative native Korean terms,

making communication clearer and more accurate.


📘 Distinguish foreign vs Sino-Korean terms

💬 Translate and simplify financial jargon

🔍 Compare confusing expressions side-by-side


Simple. Understandable. For everyone.

“Is this the right word to use?”

Just search and find out.

accepted.name: kenny
accepted.description: I am a designer who creates the tools and experiences that users truly need. I believe good design goes beyond visuals, flow and development.

plugins.name: Design to System
plugins.description:
Design to System is a Figma plugin that helps you convert your existing designs into a structured design system — effortlessly.

With just a few clicks, you can extract styles from your design, register them as local styles, and reapply them consistently across your file.


Key Features

  1. 🔍 Analyze Selection : Extracts all design style properties (colors, text styles, shadows) from the selected layers. Color values are automatically categorized into background, text, and stroke styles for easier organization.
  2. 📌 Register Styles : Registers the extracted styles into your Figma local styles panel. This enables consistent reuse and supports design system creation.
  3. 🎯 Apply Styles : Applies the registered local styles back to the selected design elements — ensuring consistency and systemization.
plugins.tagline: Turn your designs into a reusable system – automatically.

136167.name: Design to System
136167.description:
Design to System is a Figma plugin that helps you convert your existing designs into a structured design system — effortlessly.

With just a few clicks, you can extract styles from your design, register them as local styles, and reapply them consistently across your file.


Key Features

  1. 🔍 Analyze Selection : Extracts all design style properties (colors, text styles, shadows) from the selected layers. Color values are automatically categorized into background, text, and stroke styles for easier organization.
  2. 📌 Register Styles : Registers the extracted styles into your Figma local styles panel. This enables consistent reuse and supports design system creation.
  3. 🎯 Apply Styles : Applies the registered local styles back to the selected design elements — ensuring consistency and systemization.
136167.tagline: Turn your designs into a reusable system – automatically.

plugins.name: Awesome Bulk Metadata Importer
plugins.description:
Have you ever tried to add extra documentation to your Figma components, looking or better parity with your code or docs site? With this plugin, you can better utilize the Assets menu by searching components or icons by description or keywords.


This plugin checks a JSON file, and updates the alt text/description, synonym keywords, and link for all components and variants. Run this 1x for your entire library and stop wasting time manually updating metadata!


Sample CSV and JSON template
plugins.tagline: Bulk update your component descriptions, keywords, and docs link

plugins.name: Markdown Import
plugins.description:
このプラグインは、Google Docsやメモ帳などからコピーしたマークダウン形式のテキストを、Figmaのページ内にインポートするツールです。

「# 見出し1 」「 ## 見出し2」「### 見出し3」「本文」の構造を自動で判別し、それぞれに対応するコンポーネントを選択して挿入することができます。


【主な機能】

  1. マークダウン記法でコピー＆ペースト → 自動でレイアウト生成
  2. 見出し1〜3、本文、それぞれに同一ページ内の任意のコンポーネントを割り当て可能
  3. コンポーネント内のテキストレイヤーを自動で認識し、文字を置換


---


This plugin lets you import markdown-style text into your Figma page directly from Google Docs, Notepad, or any markdown editor.


It automatically parses the structure of your content—such as # Heading 1, ## Heading 2, ### Heading 3, and body text —and allows you to assign custom components for each section during import.


【Key Features】

  1. Paste markdown-formatted text and auto-generate layout in Figma
  2. Assign your preferred components for headings (H1–H3) and body text
  3. Detect and replace text inside the designated layer of each component
plugins.tagline: マークダウンのテキストをコンポーネントを適用してインポート | Import markdown into Figma with component mapping.

【主な機能】

plugins.name: Button State Builder
plugins.description:
Button State Builder helps you create all interactive states (hover, pressed, disabled, & focused) from a single base button. Style your base button (colors, fonts, icons) however you like — then run the plugin to automatically generate polished, accessible states.


To properly run the plugin, the button layout must include a state layer that accepts interactive color states. We recommend starting from a base button provided in the playground file.
plugins.tagline: Build perfect button states, effortlessly

plugins.name: SAR - Search and Replace
plugins.description:
**SAR (Search and Replace)** is a simple and efficient Figma plugin that helps you rename layers in bulk.


Select any frame or run across the entire page to:

- 🔍 Search for any text in layer names

- ✏️ Replace it with new content

- 🧠 Choose case-sensitive or global replacement


Perfect for cleaning up messy file structures, renaming layers by version or type, and maintaining naming consistency across your design system.


No more manual renaming. Just SAR it. 🚀
plugins.tagline: Quickly search and replace text in layer names – all at once.

plugins.name: Artboard Theme Switcher
plugins.description:
A lightweight plugin for switching between light and dark themes while preserving your design work.


Hierarchical Color System

Automatically adjusts section colors based on nesting depth. Parent sections use your defined colors, while child sections receive calculated brightness adjustments (-10 for light mode, +10 for dark mode per level).


Frame Protection

Multi-layer protection ensures frames, components, and instances are never modified. Only page backgrounds and sections are affected.


Performance Optimized

48KB bundle with sub-200ms execution time. Uses efficient HSB color calculations for smooth operation.


How Hierarchical Coloring Works

  1. Light Mode: Child sections get progressively darker (-10 brightness per nesting level)
  2. Dark Mode: Child sections get progressively lighter (+10 brightness per nesting level)


This creates visual depth automatically without manual configuration. Frame content and designed elements remain completely protected.

accepted.name: Anmol Kumar
accepted.description: i skip meals to design stuff ✷

plugins.tagline: Easily Switch Between Dark and Light Colour themes for your Figma Pages and Sections

135549.name: Artboard Theme Switcher

Performance Optimized

How Hierarchical Coloring Works

  1. Light Mode: Child sections get progressively darker (-10 brightness per nesting level)
  2. Dark Mode: Child sections get progressively lighter (+10 brightness per nesting level)


This creates visual depth automatically without manual configuration. Frame content and designed elements remain completely protected.
135549.tagline: Easily Switch Between Dark and Light Colour themes for your Figma Pages and Sections

plugins.name: datify
plugins.description:
Quickly update or increment dates across selected frames or text layers. It's perfect for tables, planners, and any layout where dates need to be updated regularly.


  1. Set a start date and automatically increment dates within each frame or across multiple frames
  2. Auto-detect the existing date values across selected frames
  3. Retain the original date format or choose from a list of supported formats
  4. Skip hidden layers
  5. Choose whether to increment dates continuously across all selected frames or restart within each frame
  6. Set the increment to 0 to update all date values to the same date


📅 Supported date formats:

  1. MMM D (Jan 31)
  2. D MMM YYYY (31 Jan 2025)
  3. D MMMM YYYY (31 January 2025)
  4. MMMM D, YYYY (January 31, 2025)
  5. YYYY-MM-DD (2025-01-31)
  6. DD/MM/YYYY (31/01/2025)
  7. DD-MM-YYYY (31-01-2025)
  8. D/M/YYYY (5/6/2025)
  9. M/D/YY (1/31/25)
  10. YYYY/MM/DD (2025/01/31)
  11. MMMM YYYY (January 2025)
  12. D MMM YY (31 Jan 25)
  13. D.M.YYYY (31.01.2025)
  14. YYYY. M. D (2025. 1. 31)
plugins.tagline: A quick way to update and format dates in your designs

134491.name: datify
134491.description:

plugins.name: Section Template Manager
plugins.description:
Section Template Manager streamlines your daily workflow in FigJam by automatically duplicating template sections with today's date. Perfect for teams who use FigJam for daily stand-ups, retrospectives, or any recurring activities.


Key Features:

• One-click duplication - No UI, just instant action

• Automatic dating - New sections are named with today's date (YYYY-MM-DD)

• Smart organization - Existing dated sections automatically shift to maintain chronological order

• Template flexibility - Any section starting with "TEMPLATE" becomes a reusable template


How it works:

1. Create a section with a name starting with "TEMPLATE"

2. Run the plugin

3. Your template is duplicated with today's date, and existing sections are organized


Perfect for:

• Daily KPT (Keep/Problem/Try) retrospectives

• Team stand-up meetings

• Weekly reports and reviews

• Project status tracking

• Any recurring documentation needs


Save time and maintain consistency in your team's documentation workflow. No more manual copying or renaming - let Section Template Manager handle the repetitive tasks so you can focus on what matters.
plugins.tagline: Organize your daily sections with one click

plugins.name: 文案提取与替换 Text Extractor & Replacer
plugins.description:
介绍

文案提取与替换是一款高效实用的 Figma 插件，可快速提取选中元素中的文本，并支持批量修改与一键替换，适用于多语言版本设计、内容本地化与运营迭代场景。


功能说明

  1. 提取选中节点中的全部文本内容
  2. 自动合并重复文案并展示唯一列表
  3. 可逐条输入替换文案
  4. 支持一键替换全部或单条替换
  5. 支持复制原文案、一键恢复初始值
  6. 替换后自动更新当前原文显示


使用方法

  1. 选中一个或多个页面元素
  2. 点击【📋 提取选中文案】，展示全部原文案
  3. 输入对应的替换内容
  4. 点击【替换】按钮应用更改（可单条或全部替换）
  5. 点击【复制】获取原文，或点击【恢复】重填初始内容


注意事项

  1. 插件执行替换前需加载原文字体（已自动处理）
  2. 替换仅影响文本内容，不修改字体样式
  3. 替换基于精确匹配，请确保输入一致
  4. 请在提取前确保已选中有效节点


Introduction

Text Extractor & Replacer is a practical Figma plugin designed to help you quickly extract and batch replace text from selected elements—ideal for multi-language design workflows, localization, and content iteration.


Function Description

  1. Extract all text from selected nodes
  2. Display a unique list of original strings
  3. Edit replacements in a unified interface
  4. One-click replace for individual or all text
  5. Copy original text and restore initial values anytime
  6. Auto-update "original" label after each replacement


How to Use

  1. Select one or more elements in your Figma file
  2. Click 📋 Extract Text to list all unique texts
  3. Input replacement values next to each entry
  4. Click Replace (per-row or globally) to apply changes
  5. Use Copy to copy source text or Restore to revert input


Notes

  1. Font loading is required before text replacement (handled automatically)
  2. This plugin only replaces text values, not font styles
  3. Replacements are based on exact match
  4. Make sure to select nodes before extraction

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Quickly extract and replace text in bulk with ease

plugins.name: QR Code Automation
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to update / replace all QR codes in your Figma file with just one click! You have the total control over sizes, and Color!


How to use it:


  1. Create a text layer.
  2. Name the text layer "QR-Link". (You can change the content of this layer at any time — the name should remain "QR-Link".)
  3. Create one or multiple rectangles (squares) and name them "QR-Code".
  4. Create a second text layer
  5. Name the text layer "QR-color", and add the Hex code of the color you want your QR-Code to have inside the text layer.
  6. Run the Plugin


The plugin will generate a QR code using the content from the "QR-Link" text layer. It will place the QR code over each rectangle named "QR-Code" and match the dimensions of the rectangle. If the rectangle is inside a frame, the QR code will be placed inside that frame as well.


If you run the plugin again, the existing QR codes will be replaced with the updated ones.


Hint:

  1. It's not a problem if there are multiple text layers named "QR-Link" — just make sure that all of them contain the exact same text content. Otherwise, the plugin will not run.
  2. It does not matter if you add the Hex-code with or without the #
plugins.tagline: Auto update multiple QR-Codes with one click

134125.description:

plugins.name: Zeytal Variables Extractor
plugins.description:
Zeytal lets designers and developers auto-generate front-end code from Figma.


You can use it to:

  1. Extract and optimize SVGs
  2. Extract and convert Figma variables to .ts, .js, .css, .scss, etc.
  3. Extract and convert Figma styles to .ts, .js, .css, .scss, etc.


This plugin helps Figma users prepare their Figma files for Figma variables extraction and code generation.


For more info, see the docs.
plugins.tagline: From Figma to Code In One Command Line
